summary.para: The structure and is used to identify a monitor on the system (VMR-7 only).

remarks.para: In DirectX 9.0 and later, the monitor is identified by an integer index, not by a GUID.

summary.para: Pointer to the GUID member of the structure. pGUID is NULL if the monitor is the default DirectDraw device.
Specifies the GUID for the monitor.
